column4: Dead Sea Premier Anti Hair Loss Shampoo - Imported
column13:
Dead Sea Premier Anti Hair Loss Shampoo - Imported (200 ml) Price: Rs.2400

Dead Sea Premier Anti Hair Loss Shampoo 200ml/6. 8oz. After six years of research including aerospace research our scientists discovered that hair loss might result from sodium build up in the hair follicle. Occasionally the hair follicle gets clogged with sodium usually as a result of stress malnutrition or due to genetics. These factors may contribute to hair loss our Hair Loss Preventive Care Shampoo will help in several ways. this shampoo will neutralize the sodium and provide necessary nutrients to the root of the hair follicle and it will nourish the matrix cells.
